name: Neon Shop
description:
And the god said: “Let there be Light!”, and here is the chance for you to become a perfect light master. Welcome to Neon Shop, the ultimate Neon crafting game.

You will create realistic 3D Neon Lights with just a finger swipe! Heat the glass, bend it, fill it with colorful neon gas, give electricity and watch the magic happens!

You can decorate your shop and sell your neon arts to customers.

So what are you waiting for? Enjoy the amazing colors, lights and the satisfaction of crafting! Decorate and beautify your shop and atelier, have more customers. You will love this stylish, creative and fun game with toon style animations and characters.
